sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
A fourth volume of familiar letters, upon various emergent occasions, partly [brace] philosophical, political, historical. [brace] / By James Hovvell Esq. clerk of the councell to his late Majestie. Never publish'd before. Howell, James, 1594?-1666. Howell, James, 1594?-1666. Correspondence.
[8], 126, [8] p.
Printed for Humphrey Moseley, and are to be sold at his shop at the Princes Arms in St. Paul's Church-yard, London, : 1655.
Also published as vol. 4 of his Epistolæ Ho-elianæ. Annotation on Thomason copy: "June 11:". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

Printed for Humphrey Moseley, and are to be sold at his shop at the Princes Arms in St. Paul's Church-yard, London, : 1655.
Also published as vol. 4 of his Epistolæ Ho-elianæ. Annotation on Thomason copy: "June 11:". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
